name: Escape Room (itch) (arachnid56)
description:
Solo submission for Indie Tales Game Jam 2021.

The game is a first person 3d puzzle game to escape from a room. The game was written in the Haxe language using the Heaps game engine. I ran out of time to implement music and sound effects but this was my first 3d game so overall im happy with the result.

Hope you enjoy the game, I had a lot of fun making it!

*Game takes a few seconds to load in browser*
